channel.title: Irish on The Condition of the Republic
channel.description: Recent content in Irish on The Condition of the Republic

item.title: Notes on Irish Feudalism
item.description: Duffy, Seán, Brian Boru and the Battle of Clontarf. Gill Books, 2014. 2 Armagh had a position of prominence by hte seventh century because of its being supposedly founded by st. Patrick. 3 This is why brian Bóraime promoted the primatial claims of a Munster church, aligned himself with Armagh; requirements to acquire a national ecclesiastical capital. 4 A body of law tracts called the Brehon laws surviving from the 7th - 9th centuries give us the insights were have into medieval Irish society.
